articles.title: Lionel Messi Scores On Return As PSG Extend Ligue 1 Lead
articles.description: Messi, who won the World Cup with Argentina, received a warm welcome from the Parc des Princes crowd and netted from close range in the 72nd minute to add to Hugo Ekitike's first-half opener, putting PSG on 47 points from 18 games.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi celebrated his return to competition after the World Cup by scoring a second-half goal as Paris St Germain extended their Ligue 1 lead to six points with a 2-0 home win over Angers on Wednesday.

articles.title: World No 1 Carlos Alcaraz to return in Argentina after missing Australian Open
articles.description: Alcaraz, 19, pulled out of the year's first Grand Slam tournament - the Australian Open - due to a freak leg injury suffered in training.
articles.content:
Buenos Aires: World number one Carlos Alcaraz will make his return to tennis at the Argentina Open in February, after being forced to miss this month’s Australian Open due to injury, organisers revealed on Wednesday.

articles.title: World No 1 Carlos Alcaraz to begin 2023 season at Argentina Open
articles.description: Alcaraz was forced to withdraw from the 2023 Australian Open last week after contracting a muscle in his right leg during training.
articles.content:
World No 1 Carlos Alcaraz to begin 2023 season at Argentina Open

articles.title: Messi scores for PSG on return after World Cup triumph
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored in Paris Saint-Germain's 2-0 win over Angers in Ligue 1 on his first appearance since leading Argentina to victory in the World Cup
articles.content:
Lionel Messi scored in Paris Saint-Germain’s 2-0 win over Angers in Ligue 1 on Wednesday on his first appearance since leading Argentina to victory in the World Cup in Qatar.

articles.title: Remains of Four Dinosaur Species Found in Chile for First Time: Report
articles.description: The fossils were found in Cerro Guido, in southern Chile's Las Chinas valley near the border with Argentina, and taken to a laboratory in 2021
articles.content:
Scientists have found the remains of four species of dinosaurs, including a megaraptor, in an inhospitable valley in Chilean Patagonia that has emerged over the past decade as an important fossil deposit, researchers said Wednesday.
The fossils were ... [1956 chars]

articles.title: Argentine bike path victims recount friends' death in NYC attack
articles.description: Ten high school pals from Argentina traveled to New York City. “We were celebrating 30 years since we graduated, 35 years since we knew each other, and there were some birthdays we were celebrating,” Juan Pablo Trevisan testified. Five in the group were killed in an alleged terror attack.
articles.content:
Ten high school friends from Argentina traveled to New York for several days of fun — but only five went home after accused terrorist Sayfullo Saipov ran them down with a rented truck, witnesses at Saipov’s trial recounted Wednesday.

articles.description: Lionel Messi was prevented from showing off the World Cup trophy he won with Argentina in Qatar before scoring for Paris Saint-Germain in their Ligue 1 clash against Angers

articles.title: Brazil to name woman as envoy to Washington for first time - source
articles.description:
Viotti's appointment would need confirmation by the Brazilian Senate. Lula's government is making an effort to include more women in top diplomatic positions.
Ambassador Maria Laura da Rocha was named deputy foreign minister and a woman is also being considered for the embassy in Argentina, the source said.
articles.content: Diplomat Maria Luiza Viotti is expected to be the new Brazilian ambassador in Washington, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Wednesday, as President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva pushes for more women in important diplomatic posts. Vio... [1027 chars]
